data.Page_Heading: Cyanide Isotainer and Equipment Check List

components.text: Eye wash & Safety shower lower floor
Eye wash & Safety shower upper floor
Visually inspect condition of ISO for damage
Replace gasket on hose once per week (Sunday D/S)
Never do a pressure test across shifts
Flip 3 placards (from 1689 to 3414) & 2 indicator plates from solid to solution
